content: संबंधिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Relating or belonging to. {@--2@} Connected with, serving as an adjunct, inherent. {@--3@} Possessing good qualities. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A relation by marriage; <ls>U. 4. 9.</ls> {@--2@} A relation, kinsman (in general). <ls>U. 1. 16</ls>; <ls>R. 2. 38.</ls>
